synopsis.text: OVAs for the anime "Brothers Conflict" are set to explore the festive seasons of Christmas and Valentine's Day, with Ema Hinata and her 13 charming stepbrothers at the heart of the story. The episodes, released in 2014 and 2015, feature fresh opening and ending theme songs performed by the original singers. As emotions run high, Ema may find herself developing a deeper bond with one of her brothers amidst the holiday celebrations.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
